abilities.name: Mountainwalk
abilities.description: This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.

name: Llanowar Elves
description: Sacrifice an Elf, produce a green mana

abilities.name: Elvish Mana
abilities.description: Tap this card, add a green mana to your mana pool

name: Serra Angel
description: An angelic being from Serra's realm

abilities.name: Vigilance
abilities.description: Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.

abilities.name: Flying
abilities.description: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

name: Undead Dragon
description: A powerful dragon once, a powerful dragon always.

abilities.name: Flying
abilities.description: This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.

abilities.name: Toxic Breath
abilities.description: Each time Undead Dragon attacks it may deal 2 damage directly to opponent creature or player

name: Mystic Mermaid
description: A mystical mermaid with the power to control water and air.

abilities.name: Hydrokinesis
abilities.description: Mystic Mermaid can tap to counter target spell that targets a merfolk you control.

abilities.name: Aeromancy
abilities.description: Mystic Mermaid can tap to give target creature flying until end of turn.

name: Inferno Sphinx
description: A fiery sphinx that possesses knowledge of both fire and darkness.

abilities.name: Pyroclasm
abilities.description: When Inferno Sphinx enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to each creature and player.

abilities.name: Shadow Step
abilities.description: Inferno Sphinx can't be blocked except by creatures with shadow or flying.

name: Celestial Phoenix
description: A majestic phoenix with the power of light, water, and fire.

abilities.name: Rebirth
abilities.description: When Celestial Phoenix dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of your next upkeep.

abilities.name: Tri-Elemental Fury
abilities.description: Celestial Phoenix has protection from black and can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.
